name: tinect/altcha-captcha
description: Self-hosted Altcha Captcha plugin for Shopware 6. Adds secure, user-friendly bot protection without relying on third-party services.

description.de-DE: Fügt selbstgehostetes Altcha-CAPTCHA zu Shopware 6 hinzu und stärkt die Formularsicherheit mit einer leichten, datenschutzfreundlichen Lösung gegen automatisierten Spam.
description.en-GB: Adds self-hosted Altcha CAPTCHA support to Shopware 6, improving form security with a lightweight, privacy-first solution that protects shops from automated spam.
